bug.author: kiwionly
bug.description:
To get help from the community, we encourage using Stack Overflow and the <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow.js>tensorflow.js</denchmark-link> tag. <denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
1.0.0 <denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
chrome 80.0.3987.87 <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
wrong sample code in <denchmark-link:https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tfjs-training-classfication/index.html#6>page</denchmark-link>
Show a confusion matrix
tfvis.show.confusionMatrix(container, confusionMatrix, classNames); should be tfvis.render.confusionMatrix(container, {values: confusionMatrix}, classNames);

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kiwionly>@kiwionly</denchmark-link> thank you for reporting , are you referring to the code in this <denchmark-link:https://codelabs.developers.google.com/codelabs/tfjs-training-classfication/index.html#6>page</denchmark-link>
In the page you mentioned there is no reference to <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43972606/74271946-9aa39680-4cc2-11ea-83a8-af3775efeef0.png></denchmark-link>

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rthadur>@rthadur</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kiwionly>@kiwionly</denchmark-link> I was able to find the reference. Will fix and redeploy shortly.
This has been fixed. Thanks for reporting.
